mapper.select: SELECT p10_assets.*, p10_address.*, p10_assets_re.assets_re_id assetsReId FROM `p10_assets_liqui_transfer_record_re` LEFT JOIN p10_assets_re ON p10_assets_re.assets_re_id = p10_assets_liqui_transfer_record_re.assets_re_id LEFT JOIN p10_assets ON p10_assets.assets_id=p10_assets_re.assets_id LEFT JOIN p10_address ON p10_address.user_id=p10_assets.assets_id AND p10_address.type=4 WHERE p10_assets_liqui_transfer_record_re.liqui_transfer_record_id=#{liquiTransferRecordId}

SELECT p10_assets.*, p10_assets_re.*, p10_address.* FROM `p10_assets_liqui_transfer_record_re` LEFT JOIN p10_assets_re ON p10_assets_re.assets_re_id = p10_assets_liqui_transfer_record_re.assets_re_id LEFT JOIN p10_assets ON p10_assets.assets_id=p10_assets_re.assets_id LEFT JOIN p10_address ON p10_address.user_id=p10_assets.assets_id AND p10_address.type=4 WHERE p10_assets_liqui_transfer_record_re.liqui_transfer_record_id=#{liquiTransferRecordId}

SELECT p10_assets_liqui_transfer_record_re.* FROM p10_project LEFT JOIN p10_liqui_transfer_record ON p10_liqui_transfer_record.project_id = p10_project.project_id AND p10_liqui_transfer_record.`status` != 2 LEFT JOIN p10_assets_liqui_transfer_record_re on p10_assets_liqui_transfer_record_re.liqui_transfer_record_id=p10_liqui_transfer_record.liqui_transfer_record_id WHERE p10_project.project_id = #{projectId} and p10_assets_liqui_transfer_record_re.assets_re_id=#{assetsReId}
